WorkItem.ClosedComment: User had a resil item equipped
WorkItem.Description:
Thanks for a good program. I have a problem getting optimization to give me def cap results.
 
I use rawr ver 2.3.2 and is a prot warrior, under target lvl in option panel have i choosed 83.
I have under optimazion added a rule that % chance to be crit has to be =<0
 
Before I ran the optimization my defence was 539, and after it dropped to 529.
In both cases it says my change to be crit is 0.00% 
If i hover the mouse over i se the number chance to crit reduzed by 5.07 and before I ran optimzation it was 5.47
 
How do i get get my def cap to be 535 (change to  crit reduzed by 5,40) fighting in heroic dungeons, and 540 (reduzed by5,60) if I tank in raids
 
File attached after optimation has been run

Comments.Message: Haven't looked at your file, but I'd guess you've got Quel'Serrar. Edit it to remove its proc; it's counting the def from the proc as crit capping you.
We could have a % chance to be crit (passive), which is a stored stat that doesn't include the average stats from special effects.

Your boots, Titan-Forged Greaves of Triumph, add 48 resilience. Optimizing to not be crit takes resilience into account, this is why the optimizer is saying you are crit immune at 529 defense; because you are.
thanks for your reply, it was the resilience in the boots, tried to shift boots, and got the expeted resaults for the def cap.
